parameters.name: Name
parameters.description: The name of the connection to delete.

nested_items.name: ConnectionArn
nested_items.description: The ARN of the connection that was deleted.

nested_items.name: ConnectionState
nested_items.description: The state of the connection before it was deleted.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: A time stamp for the time that the connection was created.

nested_items.name: LastModifiedTime
nested_items.description: A time stamp for the time that the connection was last modified before it was deleted.

nested_items.name: LastAuthorizedTime
nested_items.description: A time stamp for the time that the connection was last authorized before it wa deleted.
